Original:
一家新開的店，裝潢很有品味，座椅擺設很有英式摩登咖啡店！印象深刻是冰美式，看起來像Guinness黑啤酒一樣，形成泡沫，靜置沉澱後，形成如奶油般質地的細緻泡沫於杯頂！另外一點是他們家的熱拿鐵喝起來是60度溫度剛剛好，我才發現原來可以有這樣的溫度，超喜歡的👍🏼
摩登塔口感也很棒，一試愛試，當天直接吃了兩個👍🏼 …
EN:
A newly opened shop has a tasteful decoration, and the seat furnishings are very British modern coffee shops!Impression is the ice American style. It looks like Guinness dark beer. It forms a foam. After setting up the sediment, it forms a delicate foam like creamy texture at the top of the cup!Another point is that the hot latte of their home is just 60 degrees the temperature just right, but I found that there can be such a temperature.
Modern tower taste is also great. Trying love and trying, I ate two 👍🏼 directly on the same day ...

Original:
很榮幸成為第一個評論的客人
新開幕的店，滿心期待的前往用餐，第一次是午餐時間，跟服務人員要水，對方回說附近的都可以拿，仔細看了一下附近有水的只有隔壁空桌，於是拿了隔壁桌的水杯倒水，服務員看到馬上說「不可以拿隔壁的喔！」，那請問我的水與杯子在哪呢？

第二次與朋友各點了一杯熱拿鐵，來的是5、60度的溫咖啡，跟老闆反應了一下，被回應：「我們這邊都是這樣的，請妳下次先說！」，可是菜單上並沒有註明你的咖啡是溫咖啡而非熱咖啡啊！我如何先告知呢？

店內排風不佳，全身油煙味離場。
給想前往用餐的朋友參考，如果想喝杯熱熱的咖啡或享受熱情的服務的話⋯⋯⋯⋯
EN:
Very honored to become the first guest to comment
The newly opened store, looking forward to dining full of expectations, the first time is lunch time, and the service staff asked for water. The other party said that all the people nearby can take it. Take a closer look at the empty table next door. So I took the next door. The water cup of the table poured water, and the waiter immediately said, "Don't take the next door!", So where is my water and cup?

The second time I ordered a cup of hot latte with my friends. The 5, 60 -degree warm coffee came, and responded to the boss, and was responded: "We are all like this. Please say it next time!" But the menu does not indicate that your coffee is warm coffee rather than hot coffee!How do I tell first?

The rowing wind in the store is not good, and the smell of the whole body of the oil fume is left.
For friends who want to go to dining, if you want to drink a cup of hot coffee or enjoy enthusiastic service ...

Original:
甜品十分好吃，咖啡也很好喝😋
環境舒適，很適合在這裡渡過一個下午🤤
EN:
Dessert is very delicious, coffee is also very delicious 😋
The environment is comfortable, it is very suitable for crossing for an afternoon here.
